## Load neccessary libraries

```{r }
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

```



## Data manipulation 

```{r }

tmp <- data.table(iris)

ggplot(tmp) + geom_point(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, col = Species)) + 
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(legend.position =  'bottom')


```
